tldr: Affected versions of this package are vulnerable to a buffer overflow, which can be triggered by sending a malformed 802.15.4 packet. This vulnerability allows an attacker to cause the system to assert and reset, resulting in a temporary disruption of service.
doest_this_affect_me: You are affected if you are using a version that falls within the vulnerable range.
how_to_fix: Upgrade the `SiliconLabs.simplicity_sdk` library to the patch version.
